sources.title: Treasure of the Yankee Zephyr (1981) Helicopter Chase for WWII’s Lost Millions!
sources.description:
A drunken deer hunter, his pilot colleague and his daughter compete with a treasure hunter to reach a lake in New Zealand and uncover a WWII-era plane wreck carrying a fortune in gold.

Original title: Race for the Yankee Zephyr 
Alternative title: Treasure of the Yankee Zephyr

Director: David Hemmings
Writers: Everett De Roche

Main cast:
Ken Wahl – Barney Whitaker
Lesley Ann Warren – Sally Gibson
Donald Pleasence – Gibbie Gibson
George Peppard – Theo Brown

Genres: Action, Adventure, Drama
Release date: December 18, 1981
Filming location: New Zealand


https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: In a lake high in the mountains of New Zealand hunter Gibbie Gibson discovers a plane wreck from ww-ii. When he tells it around, a gang of crooks follows and threatens him and his daughter, because they know there are 50 million dollars in the wreck. Helicopter pilot Barney helps Gibbie against them, risking his life thereby.
metadata.Actors: Ken Wahl, Lesley Ann Warren, Donald Pleasence
metadata.Country: Australia, New Zealand, United States, United Kingdom
